53.1.hd_quote: Development succeeds when the foundation is gathered first.
53.1.behavioral_axis: Wants a solid base before pushing the start.
53.1.shadow_axis: Never starts because the base is ‘not perfect yet’.

53.2.hd_quote: Past success fuels development of the new.
53.2.behavioral_axis: If the previous phase worked, this one can start.
53.2.shadow_axis: Forces a start to copy a past win that no longer fits.

53.3.hd_quote: Development needs conflict reduced to go on.
53.3.behavioral_axis: Cuts noise so the cycle can keep moving.

53.4.hd_quote: In uncertain beginnings, maintain your own direction.
53.4.behavioral_axis: Keeps its signal steady while the start is messy.
53.4.shadow_axis: Becomes stubborn and won’t adapt to the group start.

53.5.hd_quote: Emphasizing the value of development wins support.
53.5.behavioral_axis: Shows everyone why this cycle matters right now.

53.6.hd_quote: Success in one phase attracts support for the next.
53.6.behavioral_axis: Uses one completed stage to launch the following one.
53.6.shadow_axis: Hides wins → can’t get support for the next phase.
